name: WF-1000XM5 Black
description:
The best noise cancelling* with two high performance processors and dual feedback microphones (*As of September 1, 2024. Ambient noise reduction according to research by Sony Corporation, measured using JEITA-compliant guidelines for the top 10 brands (by market share) of truly wireless style of noise-cancelling headphones market.)
    Astonishing sound quality with High-Resolution Audio
    Sony’s best ever call quality* (*As of June 26, 2023, in truly wireless headphones.)
